data.title: The Good Ones
data.description: Amy returns from maternity leave. Jake and Rosa work a difficult case.

data.title: The Lake House
data.description: The squad takes up Holt on an offer for a weekend getaway.

data.title: Blue Flu
data.description: Captain Holt and Amy manage an understaffed precinct. Jake and Charles investigate.

data.title: Balancing
data.description: Jake and Amy create a system to balance work and childcare and Rosa gets a new houseguest.

data.title: PB&J
data.description: Jake takes an old friend for a ride.

data.title: The Set Up
data.description: When the FBI takes over a high-profile case, Jake keeps digging. Amy and Rosa negotiate with O'Sullivan and the police union.

data.title: Game of Boyles
data.description: Jake and Terry accompany Charles to the funeral of his Great Uncle Pappy — and uncover a family secret. Rosa nudges Holt back into the dating pool.

data.title: Renewal
data.description: Amid planning for a vow renewal ceremony, Holt makes a big announcement — one that he asks Jake not to share with Amy. Plus, Cheddar wears a bow tie!

data.title: The Last Day Pt 1
data.description: The squad takes stock of its eight years together and looks toward the future.

data.title: The Last Day Pt 2
data.description: The squad takes stock of its eight years together and looks toward the future.
